objects.name: Analytic 1634
objects.description: Detects kernel- or user-space exploitation attempts targeting auditd, AV daemons, or security monitoring agents. Defender observation includes unexpected segfaults, privilege escalation attempts from low-privileged processes, or modifications to security binaries. Correlates exploitation attempts with subsequent gaps in logging or terminated processes.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of suspicious exploit binaries targeting security daemons

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Segfaults, kernel oops, or crashes in security software processes

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of critical security daemons (e.g., auditd, falco, AV agents) to monitor for exploitation.
Regex or patterns for kernel/syslog errors correlated with exploitation attempts.
